author: sky.cactus
content: It is possible you could find someone to take over maintenance of it.  Ideally someone who runs other services already and adding another wouldn't be too difficult.  Can you share stats on its traffic volume (connections and bandwidth) so a hypothetical successor has an idea of what they are getting into?

author: sky.cactus
content: Also on-disk size, though I suspect that part is inconsequential.

author: pipermerriam
content:
It all runs on a single box.  6 cores. 16GB ram, 400GB of disk, currently only uses about 60GB of that disk.

CPU cores are running at about 40% load.
